characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase you can pick an enemy unit, other than a CHARACTER, which is visible to this model anywhere on the battlefield, and then roll a D6. On a roll of 1-3, nothing happens.  On a roll of 4i-5 the target unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a roll of 6, the target unit suffers 3 mortal wounds. You may only call in one air raid per turn, regardless of the number of Officers of the Fleet.
